scenes.background: Monica sighs and says, 'I just don't see why we can't have a simple dinner.'
scenes.description: Bob crosses his arms and says, 'A dinner won't be memorable enough for our hard work.'

options.text: A dinner might be low-key, but it can still be special if we plan it right.
options.analysis: You showed empathy and social skill by acknowledging the suggestion and proposing a way to make it special, but motivation was lower.

options.text: Let's think about how we can combine a dinner with some fun activities.
options.analysis: You showed good perception and social skill by suggesting a compromise, but empathy and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: Maybe a dinner isn't exciting enough for everyone after such hard work.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the concern, showing good social skill and motivation, but empathy, perception, and self-regulation were moderate.
